name: OOPinJavaScript
description: OOPinJavaScript Will feature examples of OOP in JavaScript. This means both Pre-ES6 && Post-ES6 work. Understanding how OOP applies to JavaScript has been a journey for me as I originally learned it in C#. I've been extending my knowledge on FreeCodeCamp, but the OOP section simply left me with more questions than answers so I went off on my own and found some material. One of those is a series of articles by @WellPaidGeek.
